title: Laughing Planet Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A casual eatery where the menu consists of mostly burritos and salads. Regular tortillas are not vegan but could request for vegan ones. Whole wheat tortillas by request. Tofu or seitan could be added (or as a substitute) to most dishes. Sometimes has vegan cookies and vegan soup.
